price: Nismo im Mi nepravdu učinili, nego su oni baš nepravedni bili.
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
